column4: ~ means the home-dir of the current user, so its /home/username/
Well, there is no /.asoundcr file there
~/.asoundrc  if it is not there, create it if you need the file
You must know this, I am trying to make Skype works, I need to add some lines to that file so PulseAudio can use my Mic
then create the file and add your lines
then you can choose if you want gnome/unity or xfce4

you have to enable them, also see #vbox
